The Tyrells rose to power as stewards to the Kings of the Reach, whose domain included the fertile

wore a crown of vines and flowers and made the land bloom.

When Mern IX, last king of House 
Gardener, was slain on the Field of Fire, his steward Harlen Tyrell surrendered Highgarden to Aegon the 
Conqueror.
Aegon granted him the castle and dominion over the Reach.

The Tyrell sigil is a golden rose 
on a grass-green field.

Lord Mace Tyrell declared his support for Renly Baratheon at the onset of the War of the Five Kings, 
and gave him the hand of his daughter Margaery.

Upon Renly's death, Highgarden made alliance with 
House Lannister, and Margaery was betrothed to King Joffrey.
